document_data.name: Lunasa Eveningwood
document_data.mainbody: nasa had bright orange backswept hair and gray eyes.
document_data.Description: Lunasa had bright orange backswept hair and gray eyes.
document_data.History: Lunasa camped at the ruins of [[Beckside Castle]] on the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] around the time of the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]]. She sang with her companion [[Merlin Fastfoot]], including ''[[Here's a Health to the Company]]'', ''[[The Mermaid]]'', and ''[[The Crafty Maid's Policy]]''.
